song_title: I Never Loved a Man The Way I Love You

Verse: You're a liar and you're a cheat
I let you do these things to me
That I'd leave you if I could
You had run out of fools
You got one that you'll never lose
The way you treat me is a shame
How could you hurt me so bad?
Baby, you know that I'm the best thing
Chorus: I ain't never, I ain't never, no, no
Loved a man, the way that I, I love you
Don't you never, never say that we we're through
Loved a man, the way that I, I love you
Bridge: And I can't eat a bite
I guess I'll never be free
Since you got, your hooks, in me
I ain't never loved a man
I ain't never loved a man, baby
Ain't never had a man hurt me so bad, no
Well, this is what I'm gonna do about it
I tell you, I'm gonna hold on to it
Yeah, I'm gonna hold on to it, yeah1Embed
